thread.title: The Supporter of Minimalism, Airwheel personal transporter electric scooter
thread.title_full: The Supporter of Minimalism, Airwheel personal transporter electric scooter

title: The Supporter of Minimalism, Airwheel personal transporter electric scooter
text: The Supporter of Minimalism, Airwheel personal transporter electric scooter Minimalism is a kind of live concept and living style which can both benefit the society but also people who practice it.Airwheel electric scooter is the supporter of minimalism. United States, 5 October 2015 -- There are many different styles and concepts of art, of life styles, of architectures like Modernism, Post-Modernism,Luxury concept and the Minimalism. Advocating everything should be handled simple and originally, the minimalism supports tried to play a low key. With the wide spread of minimalism, there are more and more people pay lots of attention to their own life. Airwheel self-balancing scooter can successfully meet their desire to minimize every aspects of life. Green consumerism is an effective way to support the minimalism. Airwheel believes that people can make some difference. Airwheel electric scooters adopt the technology power to contribute to the environment protection. What Airwheel wants is not the profits only, it wants to make people realize that it is very important to protect living environment.As the leading company in the scooter industry. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter can offer best qualities at a really reasonable and low price. The company has set a renowned public praise through sticking to the concept of environment protection and green transportation ways. For example, the power consumption per 100 kilometer is as low as 1 kilowatt hour. Every type of the Airwheel electric scooter is designed with the unique hi-tech chip in build. The control system adopts aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system to make sure that the scooter would maintain the natural self-balance during the ride in all the directions. All the rider needs to do is to lean backward or forward to control the certain direction. Therefore this is the favorite vehicle for many scooter fans and it is their premium choice. With such amazing equipment, the electric scooter can truly make the slogan, simple is the best, and the environmental protection is not only just something to talk about. # # #
